snippet.title: Anomaly Agent - Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Anomaly Agent is available now on PC, Steam Deck, Xbox Series X|S, Xbox One and Nintendo Switch! 🤩

🔗 Visit our Steam page: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2378620/Anomaly_Agent/

For Nintendo Switch owners from EU and US Regions, there is a slight difference on our release schedule. 👇

🔸 EU: 25/01/2024 17:00
🔸 US: 25/01/2024 20:00

#game #anomalyagent #indie
